responsibilities: Dynamically update map content based on perceived lane boundaries and construction blockages on-the-fly.
Update routing plans based on unexpected construction observed online.
Produce smooth paths that can be used as initial seeds for motion planning trajectory optimization through construction and other unexpected circumstances.
Prove that all functionality can be achieved in a high-integrity, highly available way.
Develop mission-critical online algorithms in the intersection of semantic mapping and motion planning.
Create validation frameworks running on large amounts of data in large cloud compute settings.
Provide safety case evidence.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on tasks related to dynamic map updates, routing plans, motion planning, and validation frameworks, which are primarily in the domain of semantic mapping and motion planning. Fine-tuning and customization of language models, as described in this Activity, involves training or fine-tuning large language models for domain-specific tasks, which is not directly related to the responsibilities outlined. The responsibilities do not mention any tasks involving language models or their customization.
